name: Nimisha Singh
position: Deutsche Bank | CFA L1 | FRM L1 | IIT Kharagpur
about: I am a recent graduate from IIT Kharagpur. I have developed a deep interest in fields related to machine learning, data analytics, finance, quantitative finance, trading strategies in equity and digital assets. I have worked in these domains under some professors of reputed colleges. Currently I am working as an Analyst at Deutsche Bank.

experience.title: Global Finalist
experience.description: â€¢	We secured Global rank of 50th and India rank of 8th in Stage 2 (National Round) and Global rank of 25th and India rank of 12th in Stage 1(National Qualifying Round) where 1100+ active teams from more than 90+ countries around the globe participated. â€¢	We were also consistently awarded the top performing teams from India each week during the competition. â€¢	We coded various alpha models for the financial securities of USA market by our Quant research skills using Fundamental, Technical, Sentimental, Derivative data, statistical techniques and some pre-trained models. â€¢	We have also received the opportunity of becoming a Research Consultant at WorldQuant.
